item.title: 日本央行加息后，各国央行本周将提供哪些降息线索？
item.description: 全球利率处于波动之中。在发达国家央行从 2021 年底开始上调借贷成本之际，日本央行一直是 "鸽派"，本周二终于宣布其宽松货币时代结束。【原文：Global interest rates are in flux. The Bank of Japan, a holdout dove as central banks across the developed world raised borrowing costs from late 2021, finally called time on its easy money era on Tuesday.】

item.title: 印度阿达尼绿色公司称了解美国对第三方的调查，否认与美国的关系
item.description: 印度阿达尼绿色能源公司（Adani Green Energy）周二表示，该公司知道美国正在调查 "第三方 "可能违反反腐败法的行为，但否认与该实体有任何关系。【原文：India's Adani Green Energy said on Tuesday it is aware of a U.S. investigation into potential violations of anti-corruption laws by a "third party", but denied any relationship with the entity.】

item.title: 韩国将提供 3130 亿美元贷款资助碳补偿项目
item.description: 韩国政府和主要银行周二发表联合声明称，韩国誓言提供 420 万亿韩元（约合 3134 亿美元）的政策性贷款，用于资助有助于减少碳排放的项目。【原文：South Korea has vowed to provide 420 trillion won ($313.4 billion) in policy loans to finance projects to help reduce carbon emissions, a joint statement by the government and major banks said on Tuesday.】

item.title: B3 和标准普尔道琼斯指数公司推出巴西首个波动率指数
item.description: 巴西交易所运营商 B3 和 S&P 道琼斯指数公司周二推出了巴西国内市场的首个波动率指数，该指数将根据 CBOE 波动率指数（被称为华尔街的 "恐惧指数"）的方法计算。【原文：Brazilian exchange operator B3 and S&P Dow Jones Indices on Tuesday launched the first volatility index of Brazil's domestic market, to be calculated based on the methodology of the CBOE Volatility Index , known as Wall Street's fear gauge.】

item.title: 市场竞争加剧，新朋公司预计季度收入低于预期
item.description: 周二，中国电动汽车制造商新朋股份有限公司（Xpeng）预计第一季度营收低于市场预期，原因是经济低迷和激烈的竞争影响了汽车需求。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker Xpeng , forecast first-quarter revenue below market expectations on Tuesday as a sluggish economy and stiff competition weighs on vehicle demand.】

item.title: 顶级律师称，美国司法部将打击上市前的人工智能欺诈行为
item.description: 美国司法部驻旧金山的最高检察官告诉路透社记者，他的目标是那些在上市前欺诈投资者的人工智能（AI）和其他科技初创企业。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department's top prosecutor in San Francisco is targeting artificial intelligence (AI) and other tech start-ups that defraud investors before they go public, he told Reuters.】

item.title: 中央银行利用人工智能评估气候相关风险
item.description: 各国央行行长周二表示，他们利用人工智能收集数据以评估与气候相关的金融风险，这是一项新的突破，而银行和其他公司披露的信息量也将随之增加。【原文：Central bankers said on Tuesday they have broken new ground by using artificial intelligence to collect data for assessing climate-related financial risks, just as the volume of disclosures from banks and other companies is set to rise.】

item.title: 法国财政部长称空中客车公司目前状况好于波音公司
item.description: 法国财政部长布鲁诺-勒梅尔（Bruno Le Maire）周二表示，欧洲飞机制造商空中客车公司（Airbus）的处境要好于其美国竞争对手波音公司（Boeing），后者一直受到技术故障的影响。【原文：French Finance Minister Bruno Le Maire said on Tuesday that European planemaker Airbus was in a better position than its U.S rival Boeing , which has been hit by technical glitches.】

item.title: Meta 将 Facebook 和 Instagram 月费减半至 5.99 欧元
item.description: Meta Platforms 的一位高管周二表示，在与隐私监管机构讨论后，Meta Platforms 已提出将其 Facebook 和 Instagram 的月订阅费从 9.99 欧元几乎减半至 5.99 欧元。【原文：Meta Platforms has offered to almost halve its monthly subscription fee for Facebook and Instagram to 5.99 euros from 9.99 euros following discussions with privacy regulators, a senior Meta executive said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国小米 2023 年第四季度营收增长 11%，超出预期
item.description: 周二，中国智能手机制造商小米公布第四季度营收增长 10.9%，主要得益于智能手机销售强劲，行业出现复苏迹象。【原文：Chinese smartphone maker Xiaomi reported a 10.9% rise in fourth-quarter revenue on Tuesday, boosted by strong smartphone sales in an industry showing signs of recovery.】

item.title: 美联储会议前期货走势平稳
item.description: 由于投资者在美联储会议开始前保持谨慎，周二美国股指期货变化不大。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were little changed on Tuesday as investors remained cautious ahead of the start of the Federal Reserve's meeting.】

item.title: 情感敏感 "导致汽车销售放缓，宾利寻求推出新产品
item.description: 英国豪华汽车制造商宾利周二报告称，由于经济疲软和高利率打击了销售，2023 年的营业利润有所下降，但该公司表示，其业绩已趋于稳定，新产品的推出将在 2024 年提振业绩。【原文：British luxury carmaker Bentley on Tuesday reported a lower operating profit for 2023 after a weak economy and high interest rates hit sales, but the company said its performance had stabilised and new launches would boost it in 2024.】

item.title: 奥迪首席执行官表示，尽管面临逆风，奥迪仍将坚持电动车战略
item.description: 奥迪首席执行官格诺特-德尔纳（Gernot Doellner）周二表示，尽管今年面临强劲的逆风，大众汽车子公司仍将坚持其电动汽车战略。【原文：Audi Chief Executive Gernot Doellner said on Tuesday that the Volkswagen subsidiary was sticking to its electric vehicle strategy despite facing strong headwinds this year.】

item.title: 日本商业团体欢迎日本央行 17 年来首次加息
item.description: 日本最大的商业游说团体负责人表示，日本央行 "在适当的时机做出了适当的政策决定"，并对日本央行行长上田一夫 17 年来首次加息的举措表示欢迎。【原文：The Bank of Japan has made "the appropriate policy decision at the appropriate time", the head of Japan's biggest business lobby said, welcoming Governor Kazuo Ueda's move to hike interest rates for the first time in 17 years.】

item.title: 纽约主计长称 2023 年华尔街奖金下降 2
item.description: 根据纽约州审计长托马斯-迪纳波利（Thomas DiNapoli）的估计，由于金融公司对薪酬采取了更加谨慎的态度，去年华尔街的现金奖金下降了 2%，平均为 17.65 万美元。【原文：Wall Street's cash bonuses fell 2% to an average $176,500 last year as financial firms took a more cautious approach to compensation, according to an estimate by New York State Comptroller Thomas DiNapoli.】

item.title: 印花税取消后中国内地人涌入香港房地产市场
item.description: 在经历了大流行病引发的长达三年多的冷淡期后，中国大陆人开始抢购香港的房产，在香港取消所有针对外国买家的额外印花税数周后，中国大陆人在香港新售出的房产中占比高达三分之一。【原文：After a pandemic-induced lull spanning more than three years, mainland Chinese are snapping up homes in Hong Kong, accounting for up to a third of new property sales weeks after the city removed all additional stamp duties on foreign buyers.】

item.title: 辉瑞公司以 39 亿美元出售感舒雅生产商 Haleon 的股份
item.description: Haleon 周二表示，第一大股东辉瑞公司出售了大约 39 亿美元的消费者保健公司股份，使其在这家英国公司的持股比例降至 22.6%。【原文：Haleon said on Tuesday top shareholder Pfizer offloaded a roughly $3.9 billion stake in the consumer healthcare firm, bringing down its holding in the British company to 22.6%.】

item.title: 博鳌亚洲论坛调查显示，3月份看涨新兴市场和欧洲股市的投资者大举进场
item.description: 美国银行周二的基金经理调查显示，乐观的投资者在3月份以2017年4月以来最快的速度涌入新兴市场股市，并以2020年6月以来最快的速度涌入欧元区股市。【原文：Upbeat investors rushed into emerging market equities in March at the fastest pace since April 2017, and into euro zone stocks at the quickest clip since June 2020, Bank of America's fund manager survey on Tuesday showed.】

item.title: 瑞士央行呼吁在资本监管方面采取更多行动
item.description: 瑞士国家银行（Swiss National Bank）周二呼吁对银行资本监管进行审查，称瑞士需要制定相关规则，承认瑞银在收购瑞士信贷后已成为一家具有更大系统重要性的银行。【原文：The Swiss National Bank called on Tuesday for a review of bank capital regulations, saying Switzerland needed rules that recognise that UBS has become a bank with even more systemic importance following its takeover of Credit Suisse.】

item.title: 获利回吐席卷加密货币，比特币下滑 5
item.description: 由于加密货币和股票等其他风险资产遭遇抛售潮，比特币周二跌幅高达 5.7%，创两周来最大单日跌幅。【原文：Bitcoin fell by as much as 5.7% on Tuesday in its largest one-day drop in two weeks, as a wave of selling hit cryptocurrencies and other risk assets, such as stocks.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯评估凯雷对海运部门的竞购
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯（Thyssenkrupp）周二表示，正在评估向投资公司凯雷（Carlyle）部分出售其海事部门的可能性。【原文：Thyssenkrupp on Tuesday said it is evaluating the potential partial sale of its marine unit to investment firm Carlyle .】

item.title: Ben & Jerry's冰淇淋制造商联合利华将分拆冰淇淋部门，裁员7500人
item.description: 联合利华计划将旗下拥有 Magnum 和 Ben & Jerry's 等畅销品牌的冰淇淋部门分拆为独立业务，该消费品集团周二宣布了一项新的成本节约计划，将削减 7500 个工作岗位。【原文：Unilever plans to spin off its ice cream unit, home to popular brands such as Magnum and Ben & Jerry's, into a standalone business, as the consumer goods group announced a new cost-savings programme on Tuesday that would cut 7,500 jobs.】

item.title: 阿斯利康将以 20 亿美元现金收购 Fusion Pharma
item.description: 阿斯利康周二表示，已同意以约 20 亿美元现金收购处于临床阶段的生物制药公司 Fusion Pharmaceuticals Inc。【原文：AstraZeneca said on Tuesday it has agreed to buy clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company Fusion Pharmaceuticals Inc for about $2 billion in cash.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行 2023 年出售价值近 1,500 亿美元的外汇
item.description: 瑞士央行周二表示，瑞士国家银行将在2023年出售价值1,329亿瑞士法郎（约合1,495.1亿美元）的外汇，这表明该行更加重视支持瑞郎作为抵御输入性通胀的盾牌。【原文：The Swiss National Bank sold foreign currency worth 132.9 billion Swiss francs ($149.51 billion) in 2023, the central bank said on Tuesday, showing its increased emphasis on supporting the Swiss franc as a shield against imported inflation.】

item.title: 中国开发商万科的信贷追求因要求抵押品而蒙上阴影
item.description: 中国政府为帮助万科摆脱流动性危机而下达了一项罕见的指令，这使得贷款人不得不拼命寻找这家国家支持的开发商所提出的抵押资产，因为各方都在使出浑身解数来遏制房地产行业的恶化。【原文：A rare Beijing directive to help Vanke beat a liquidity crisis has left lenders scrabbling for the assets that the state-backed developer has proposed for collateral, as parties pull out all the stops to arrest deterioration in the property sector.】

item.title: 加密世界人工智能代币超越创纪录的比特币
item.description: 人工智能的蓬勃发展给加密货币市场带来了巨大冲击。【原文：The artificial intelligence boom has hit the crypto market with a bang.】

item.title: 早间竞标日本银行大手笔
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 中国三月份基准贷款利率保持不变
item.description: 路透社的一项调查显示，人们普遍预计中国将在周三维持基准贷款利率不变，因为上周在总体经济开始出现一些改善迹象之际，中国央行维持了关键政策利率的稳定。【原文：China is widely expected to leave benchmark lending rates unchanged on Wednesday, a Reuters survey showed, as the central bank kept a key policy rate steady last week at a time when the broad economy is starting to show some signs of improvement.】

item.title: 英伟达令人眼花缭乱的涨势刺激了对人工智能主题 ETF 的追捧
item.description: 在英伟达（Nvidia .NET）等市场宠儿出现令人惊叹的涨势之后，投资者开始寻求新的方式来玩转这一新兴技术，围绕人工智能的热潮引发了一股人工智能主题 ETF 的淘金热。【原文：The fervor around artificial intelligence has sparked a gold rush into AI-themed ETFs, as investors seek fresh ways to play the burgeoning technology following breathtaking rallies in market darlings such as Nvidia .】

item.title: 日元走软，日本央行退出刺激政策后日本股市出现震荡
item.description: 日本央行周二宣布结束其长期超宽松刺激计划，正如市场普遍预期的那样，日元走软，而日本日经平均股价则在小幅涨跌之间徘徊。【原文：The yen weakened while Japan's Nikkei share average swung between small gains and losses after the Bank of Japan on Tuesday announced an end to its long-running ultra-accommodative stimulus programmes, as widely expected.】
